name: Sergio Aragonés Style
description:
I had to laugh when I saw this Groo the Wanderer I had created this a while ago but didn't think anyone would like it.

I found that fking_scifi v2 is the best checkpoint for this embedding. From the sample images, those are the ones with fking_scifi_v2 in the prompt

I found using a the trigger word AsergioA with a short description works best. Negative prompts are trial and error, a lot of times one isn't needed.

If you try for getting more than a barbarian, it needs a more detailed prompt.

I have an embedding using the same training images for 1.5 but can't find the right checkpoint to get the same style as with this one. If I find one, I'll list that one too.

meta.prompt: fking_scifi_v2 AsergioA, Beautiful woman bikini beach
meta.negativePrompt: disfigured, kitsch, ugly, oversaturated, grain, low-res, Deformed, blurry, bad anatomy, disfigured, poorly drawn face, mutation, mutated, extra limb, ugly, poorly drawn hands, missing limb, blurry, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, malformed hands, blur, out of focus, long neck, long body, ugly, disgusting, poorly drawn, childish, mutilated, , mangled, old, surreal, text, blurry, b&w, monochrome, conjoined twins, multiple heads, extra legs, extra arms, fashion photos (collage:1.25), meme, deformed, elongated, twisted, fingers, strabismus, heterochromia, closed eyes, blurred, watermark,no eyes,hands

meta.prompt: fking_scifi_v2 AsergioA, man construction worker on a city street
fking_scifi_v2 AsergioA, man on a city street
